## Ride Distance and Duration Tell Us?
```{r}
load("TripLengthData.rds")

mode_bin<-which(total_counts$total_counts==max(total_counts$total_counts))
median_bin<-mean(monthly_counts$Duration.Median)

full.hist<-ggplot(total_counts,aes(x=bins,y=total_counts))+
  geom_bar(stat='identity',color="blue",fill="light blue")+
  geom_vline(xintercept=mode_bin, linetype="dotted", color="black", size=0.75)+
  geom_vline(xintercept=median_bin, linetype="dotted", color="black", size=0.75)+
  annotate(geom="text", x=5, y=1800000, label="Modal Ride= 5-6 Minutes",color="dark red",hjust=-0.01)+
  annotate(geom="text", x=11, y=1200000, label="Median Ride= 11 Minutes",color="Blue",hjust=-0.01)+
  labs(title="The Modal Ride Lasts 5-6 Minutes",
       subtitle="Rideshare Data from 2010-2019",
       y="Count",
       x="Ride Duration in Minutes")+
  ylim(0,2000000)+
  theme_light()
renderPlot(full.hist)
```

##Stock Viz
```{r eruptions}
inputPanel(
  selectInput("n_breaks", label = "Number of bins:",
              choices = c(10, 20, 35, 50), selected = 20),
  
  sliderInput("bw_adjust", label = "Bandwidth adjustment:",
              min = 0.2, max = 2, value = 1, step = 0.2)
)

renderPlot({
  hist(faithful$eruptions, probability = TRUE, breaks = as.numeric(input$n_breaks),
       xlab = "Duration (minutes)", main = "Geyser eruption duration")
  
  dens <- density(faithful$eruptions, adjust = input$bw_adjust)
  lines(dens, col = "blue")
})
```
